执行结果，包含成功/失败信息和反馈ID\n     * @throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException 当游客已为站点发布反馈时抛出\n     * @throws InvalidFeedbackException 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出\n     * @throws IllegalStateException 当出现未预期的状态错误时抛出\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult executeInsertFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) \n            throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException, InvalidFeedbackException, IllegalStateException {\n        \n        // 步骤1：激活反馈功能 - 记录日志\n        System.out.println("=== 激活反馈功能 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客ID: " + touristId + ", 站点ID: " + siteId);\n        \n        // 验证入口条件：检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("游客ID \'" + touristId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        if (!dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("站点ID \'" + siteId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤2：验证游客尚未为站点发布反馈\n        if (dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n            System.out.println("错误：游客已经为该站点发布过反馈。");\n            throw FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException.create(touristId, siteId);\n        }\n        \n        // 显示验证通过信息\n        System.out.println("验证通过：游客尚未为该站点发布反馈。");\n        \n        // 创建反馈表单，对应步骤2的显示表单部分\n        feedbackForm = new FeedbackForm(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接 - 处理连接中断的退出条件\n        if (!feedbackForm.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("错误：连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断。操作已取消。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            throw new IllegalStateException("服务器连接中断。无法继续操作。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤3：显示表单并收集输入，处理用户取消操作\n        System.out.println("\\n显示反馈表单...");\n        boolean formSubmitted = feedbackForm.showForm();\n        \n        // 处理用户取消操作（退出条件之一）\n        if (!formSubmitted) {\n            System.out.println("游客取消了反馈操作。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "操作被游客取消。");\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 步骤4：验证输入的数据\n            int rating = feedbackForm.getRating();\n            String comment = feedbackForm.getComment();\n            \n            // 创建临时反馈对象进行验证\n            Feedback tempFeedback = new Feedback("TEMP", touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n            \n            if (!tempFeedback.isValid()) {\n                System.out.println("错误：反馈数据无效或不充分。");\n                // 对应用例中的Errored用例\n                throw InvalidFeedbackException.create(rating, comment);\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤5：确认发布反馈\n            System.out.println("\\n正在确认发布反馈...");\n            \n            // 在真实系统中，这里可能会有额外的确认步骤\n            // 例如：发送确认邮件或显示确认对话框\n            \n            // 步骤6：记录反馈并将选定站点插入已访问站点列表\n            System.out.println("正在保存反馈...");\n            \n            // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n            String feedbackId = generateFeedbackId();\n            \n            // 创建最终的反馈对象\n            Feedback finalFeedback = feedbackForm.createFeedback(feedbackId);\n            \n            // 保存到数据存储\n            String savedFeedbackId = dataStorage.saveFeedback(finalFeedback);\n            \n            // 显示成功信息\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈保存成功 ===");\n            System.out.println("反馈ID: " + savedFeedbackId);\n            System.out.println("站点已添加到游客的已访问站点列表。");\n            System.out.println("游客已添加到站点的访问游客列表。");\n            \n            // 返回成功结果\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(true, savedFeedbackId, "反馈成功提交到站点。");\n            \n        } finally {\n            // 确保表单资源被关闭\n            if (feedbackForm != null) {\n                feedbackForm.close();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 处理InsertFeedback操作的便捷方法\n     * 这个方法包装了executeInsertFeedback方法，提供了更好的异常处理\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含处理结果和详细信息\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult processFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        try {\n            return executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {\n            System.out.println("数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (IllegalStateException e) {\n            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否可以为特定站点提供反馈\n     * 这个方法单独公开，以便在其他地方进行预检查\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果游客可以提供反馈返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean canTouristProvideFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        // 检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId) || !dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查游客是否已经为该站点提供过反馈\n        return !dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取数据存储实例\n     * @return 当前的数据存储实例\n     */\n    public DataStorage getDataStorage() {\n        return dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成唯一的反馈ID\n     * @return 唯一的反馈ID字符串\n     */\n    private String generateFeedbackId() {\n        // 使用UUID生成唯一ID，在实际应用中可以根据需要调整生成策略\n        return "FB_" + UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 8);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * InsertFeedbackResult类 - 内部结果类\n     * 用于封装InsertFeedback操作的结果\n     */\n    public static class InsertFeedbackResult {\n        private boolean success;\n        private String feedbackId;\n        private String message;\n        \n        /**\n         * 构造函数\n         * @param success 是否成功\n         * @param feedbackId 反馈ID（成功时）\n         * @param message 结果消息\n         */\n        public InsertFeedbackResult(boolean success, String feedbackId, String message) {\n            this.success = success;\n            this.feedbackId = feedbackId;\n            this.message = message;\n        }\n        \n        // Getter方法\n        \n        public boolean isSuccess() {\n            return success;\n        }\n        \n        public String getFeedbackId() {\n            return feedbackId;\n        }\n        \n        public String getMessage() {\n            return message;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return String.format("InsertFeedbackResult{success=%s, feedbackId=\'%s\', message=\'%s\'}", \n                               success, feedbackId, message);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 模拟测试方法：模拟反馈操作的不同场景\n     * 用于内部测试和演示\n     */\n    public void runTestScenarios() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 运行测试场景 ===");\n        \n        // 场景1：正常流程\n        System.out.println("\\n场景1：正常反馈流程");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result1 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result1.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景2：重复反馈（应该触发FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException）\n        System.out.println("\\n场景2：重复反馈（游客T001为站点S001再次反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result2 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result2.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景3：新游客对新站点\n        System.out.println("\\n场景3：新游客对新站点（游客T002为站点S002反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result3 = processFeedback("T002", "S002");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result3.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景4：不存在的游客或站点\n        System.out.println("\\n场景4：不存在的游客（游客T999为站点S001反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result4 = processFeedback("T999", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result4.getMessage());\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': '\n# Past Experience\n<experience>\n\n# Tool State\nThe current editor state is:\n(Current directory: Make sure to include all necessary functions, classes, and imports. Ensure the code is correct, efficient, and handles edge cases.\n\nUse Case:\nUse case name: InsertFeedback \nDescription: Inserts a feedback for the selected site. \nParticipating Actor: initialized by Tourist \nEntry conditions: The tourist card is in a particular site. \nFlow of events User System: \n1. Activate the feature on the issue of feedback. \n2 Verify that the visitor has not already issued a feedback for the site and displays a form for entering the feedback for the selected site. In case the visitor has already issued a feedback for the site selected, activates the use case FeedbackAlreadyReleased. \n3 Fill out the form, selecting one vote and inserting a comment, then submit. \n4 Verify the data entered and confirm the cheide. Where the data is invalid or insufficient, the system activates the use case Errored. \n5 Confirming the issue of feedback. \n6. 自定义异常类\n * 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出此异常\n * 对应用例中的Errored用例\n */\npublic class InvalidFeedbackException extends Exception {\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message) {\n        super(message);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息和原因\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     * @param cause 异常原因\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message, Throwable cause) {\n        super(message, cause);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个标准的异常对象，包含数据验证失败的具体原因\n     * @param rating 评分值\n     * @param comment 评论内容\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(int rating, String comment) {\n        StringBuilder errorMsg = new StringBuilder("反馈数据无效或不充分: ");\n        \n        // 检查评分是否有效\n        if (rating < 1 || rating > 5) {\n            errorMsg.append(String.format("评分 \'%d\' 不在有效范围内 (1-5)。", rating));\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否有效\n        if (comment == null || comment.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            if (errorMsg.length() > 0) errorMsg.append(" ");\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容不能为空。");\n        }\n        \n        // 如果评分有效但评论长度不足，也给出提示\n        if (rating >= 1 && rating <= 5 && comment != null && !comment.trim().isEmpty() \n            && comment.trim().length() < 5) {\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容至少需要5个字符。");\n        }\n        \n        return new InvalidFeedbackException(errorMsg.toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个简化的异常对象\n     * @param reason 错误原因描述\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(String reason) {\n        return new InvalidFeedbackException("反馈数据无效: " + reason);\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. 'content': 'Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertFeedback_1766845642/FeedbackForm.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.Scanner;\n\n/**\n * FeedbackForm类 - 反馈表单\n * 用于收集游客的评分和评论，包含数据验证逻辑\n * 模拟用户界面表单输入过程\n */\npublic class FeedbackForm {\n    private String touristId;\n    private String siteId;\n    private int rating;\n    private String comment;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     */\n    public FeedbackForm(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        this.touristId = touristId;\n        this.siteId = siteId;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示表单并收集用户输入\n     * 模拟用例中的步骤3：填写表单，选择一个评分并输入评论\n     * @return 如果用户成功填写表单并提交，返回true；如果用户取消操作，返回false\n     */\n    public boolean showForm() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈表单 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客: " + touristId);\n        System.out.println("站点: " + siteId);\n        System.out.println("请为您的体验提供反馈：");\n        \n        // 收集评分\n        boolean validRating = false;\n        while (!validRating) {\n            System.out.print("请输入评分 (1-5，1表示非常差，5表示非常好): ");\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            String input = scanner.nextLine();\n            if ("cancel".equalsIgnoreCase(input)) {\n                System.out.println("操作已取消。");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            try {\n                rating = Integer.parseInt(input);\n                if (rating >= 1 && rating <= 5) {\n                    validRating = true;\n                } else {\n                    System.out.println("错误：评分必须在1到5之间。请重新输入或输入\'cancel\'取消。");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("错误：请输入有效的数字 (1-5)。请重新输入或输入\'cancel\'取消。");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // 收集评论\n        boolean validComment = false;\n        while (!validComment) {\n            System.out.print("请输入评论 (至少5个字符): ");\n            \n            // 检查用户是否取消操作\n            comment = scanner.nextLine();\n            if ("cancel".equalsIgnoreCase(comment)) {\n                System.out.println("操作已取消。");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            if (comment != null && comment.trim().length() >= 5) {\n                validComment = true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("错误：评论至少需要5个字符。请重新输入或输入\'cancel\'取消。");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // 确认提交\n        System.out.print("\\n请确认提交反馈 (输入\'confirm\'确认，或\'cancel\'取消): ");\n        String confirmation = scanner.nextLine();\n        \n        if ("confirm".equalsIgnoreCase(confirmation)) {\n            System.out.println("表单提交成功！");\n            return true;\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("操作已取消。");\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用户输入的评分\n     * @return 评分值 (1-5)\n     */\n    public int getRating() {\n        return rating;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用户输入的评论\n     * @return 评论内容\n     */\n    public String getComment() {\n        return comment;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取游客ID\n     * @return 游客ID\n     */\n    public String getTouristId() {\n        return touristId;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取站点ID\n     * @return 站点ID\n     */\n    public String getSiteId() {\n        return siteId;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证表单数据是否有效\n     * 模拟用例中的步骤4：验证输入的数据\n     * @return 如果数据有效，返回true；否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateFormData() {\n        // 检查评分是否在有效范围内\n        if (rating < 1 || rating > 5) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否有效\n        if (comment == null || comment.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论长度是否足够\n        if (comment.trim().length() < 5) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建Feedback对象\n     * 注意：这个方法只应在表单数据验证通过后调用\n     * @param feedbackId 反馈ID\n     * @return 包含表单数据的Feedback对象\n     */\n    public Feedback createFeedback(String feedbackId) {\n        return new Feedback(feedbackId, touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 关闭表单资源\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n 在实际应用中，这里会检查与ETOUR服务器的连接\n        // 这里我们模拟90%的情况下连接正常，10%的情况下连接中断\n        double random = Math.random();\n        return random < 0.9; // 90%的概率连接正常\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': touristStorage.get(feedback.getTouristId());\n        if (tourist != null) {\n            tourist.addVisitedSite(feedback.getSiteId());\n        }\n        \n        // 更新站点的已访问游客列表\n        Site site /**\n     * 获取指定ID的站点\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 站点对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSite(String siteId) {\n        return siteStorage.get(siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n   /**\n     * 获取指定ID的反馈\n     * @param feedbackId 反馈ID\n     * @return 反馈对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Feedback getFeedback(String feedbackId) {\n        return touristId) {\n        List<Feedback> result = new ArrayList<>();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbackStorage.values()) {\n            if (feedback.getTouristId().equals(touristId)) {\n                result.add(feedback);\n            }\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定站点的所有反馈\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 该站点的反馈列表\n     */\n    public (feedback.getSiteId().equals(siteId)) {\n                result.add(feedback);\n            }\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查站点是否存在\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n * 获取所有站点\n     * @return 站点列表\n     */\n    public List<Site> getAllSites() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(siteStorage.values());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取所有游客\n     * @return 游客列表\n * @return 包含各种统计信息的字符串\n     */\n    public String getStorageStats() {\n        StringBuilder stats = new StringBuilder();\n        stats.append("=== 数据存储统计 ===\\n");\n        stats.append("站点数量: ").append(siteStorage.size()).append("\\n");\n        stats.append("游客数量: ").append(touristStorage.size()).append("\\n");\n        stats.append("反馈数量: ").append(feedbackStorage.size()).append("\\n");\n        \n        // 计算每个站点的反馈数量\n        stats.append("\\n各站点反馈统计:\\n");\n        for (Site site : siteStorage.values()) {\n    {\n        "command_name": "Engineer2.write_new_code",\n        "args": {\n            "path": "/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertFeedback_1766845642/FeedbackService.java",\n /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertFeedback_1766845642/FeedbackService.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.UUID;\n\n/**\n * FeedbackService类 - 核心服务类\n * 实现InsertFeedback用例的业务逻辑，协调表单验证、数据存储和异常处理\n * 执行用例中的主要步骤：\n * 1. 激活反馈功能\n * 2. 验证游客是否已发布反馈\n * 3. 处理表单数据\n * 4. 验证数据有效性\n * 5. 保存反馈\n * 6. 处理各种退出条件\n */\npublic class FeedbackService {\n    private DataStorage dataStorage;\n    private FeedbackForm feedbackForm;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    public FeedbackService(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        this.dataStorage = dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 执行InsertFeedback用例的主要方法\n     * 入口条件：游客卡片在特定站点\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含成功/失败信息和反馈ID\n     * @throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException 当游客已为站点发布反馈时抛出\n     * @throws InvalidFeedbackException 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出\n     * @throws IllegalStateException 当出现未预期的状态错误时抛出\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult executeInsertFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) \n            throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException, InvalidFeedbackException, IllegalStateException {\n        \n        // 步骤1：激活反馈功能 - 记录日志\n        System.out.println("=== 激活反馈功能 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客ID: " + touristId + ", 站点ID: " + siteId);\n        \n        // 验证入口条件：检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("游客ID \'" + touristId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        if (!dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("站点ID \'" + siteId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤2：验证游客尚未为站点发布反馈\n        if (dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n            System.out.println("错误：游客已经为该站点发布过反馈。");\n            throw FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException.create(touristId, siteId);\n        }\n        \n        // 显示验证通过信息\n        System.out.println("验证通过：游客尚未为该站点发布反馈。");\n        \n        // 创建反馈表单，对应步骤2的显示表单部分\n        feedbackForm = new FeedbackForm(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接 - 处理连接中断的退出条件\n        if (!feedbackForm.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("错误：连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断。操作已取消。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            throw new IllegalStateException("服务器连接中断。无法继续操作。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤3：显示表单并收集输入，处理用户取消操作\n        System.out.println("\\n显示反馈表单...");\n        boolean formSubmitted = feedbackForm.showForm();\n        \n        // 处理用户取消操作（退出条件之一）\n        if (!formSubmitted) {\n            System.out.println("游客取消了反馈操作。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "操作被游客取消。");\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 步骤4：验证输入的数据\n            int rating = feedbackForm.getRating();\n            String comment = feedbackForm.getComment();\n            \n            // 创建临时反馈对象进行验证\n            Feedback tempFeedback = new Feedback("TEMP", touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n            \n            if (!tempFeedback.isValid()) {\n                System.out.println("错误：反馈数据无效或不充分。");\n                // 对应用例中的Errored用例\n                throw InvalidFeedbackException.create(rating, comment);\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤5：确认发布反馈\n            System.out.println("\\n正在确认发布反馈...");\n            \n            // 在真实系统中，这里可能会有额外的确认步骤\n            // 例如：发送确认邮件或显示确认对话框\n            \n            // 步骤6：记录反馈并将选定站点插入已访问站点列表\n            System.out.println("正在保存反馈...");\n            \n            // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n            String feedbackId = generateFeedbackId();\n            \n            // 创建最终的反馈对象\n            Feedback finalFeedback = feedbackForm.createFeedback(feedbackId);\n            \n            // 保存到数据存储\n            String savedFeedbackId = dataStorage.saveFeedback(finalFeedback);\n            \n            // 显示成功信息\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈保存成功 ===");\n            System.out.println("反馈ID: " + savedFeedbackId);\n            System.out.println("站点已添加到游客的已访问站点列表。");\n            System.out.println("游客已添加到站点的访问游客列表。");\n            \n            // 返回成功结果\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(true, savedFeedbackId, "反馈成功提交到站点。");\n            \n        } finally {\n            // 确保表单资源被关闭\n            if (feedbackForm != null) {\n                feedbackForm.close();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 处理InsertFeedback操作的便捷方法\n     * 这个方法包装了executeInsertFeedback方法，提供了更好的异常处理\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含处理结果和详细信息\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult processFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        try {\n            return executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {\n            System.out.println("数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (IllegalStateException e) {\n            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否可以为特定站点提供反馈\n     * 这个方法单独公开，以便在其他地方进行预检查\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果游客可以提供反馈返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean canTouristProvideFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        // 检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId) || !dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查游客是否已经为该站点提供过反馈\n        return !dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取数据存储实例\n     * @return 当前的数据存储实例\n     */\n    public DataStorage getDataStorage() {\n        return dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成唯一的反馈ID\n     * @return 唯一的反馈ID字符串\n     */\n    private String generateFeedbackId() {\n        // 使用UUID生成唯一ID，在实际应用中可以根据需要调整生成策略\n        return "FB_" + UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 8);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * InsertFeedbackResult类 - 内部结果类\n     * 用于封装InsertFeedback操作的结果\n     */\n    public static class InsertFeedbackResult {\n        private boolean success;\n        private String feedbackId;\n        private String message;\n        \n        /**\n         * 构造函数\n         * @param success 是否成功\n         * @param feedbackId 反馈ID（成功时）\n         * @param message 结果消息\n         */\n        public InsertFeedbackResult(boolean success, String feedbackId, String message) {\n            this.success = success;\n            this.feedbackId = feedbackId;\n            this.message = message;\n        }\n        \n        // Getter方法\n        \n        public boolean isSuccess() {\n            return success;\n        }\n        \n        public String getFeedbackId() {\n            return feedbackId;\n        }\n        \n        public String getMessage() {\n            return message;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return String.format("InsertFeedbackResult{success=%s, feedbackId=\'%s\', message=\'%s\'}", \n                               success, feedbackId, message);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 模拟测试方法：模拟反馈操作的不同场景\n     * 用于内部测试和演示\n     */\n    public void runTestScenarios() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 运行测试场景 ===");\n        \n        // 场景1：正常流程\n        System.out.println("\\n场景1：正常反馈流程");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result1 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result1.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景2：重复反馈（应该触发FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException）\n        System.out.println("\\n场景2：重复反馈（游客T001为站点S001再次反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result2 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result2.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景3：新游客对新站点\n        System.out.println("\\n场景3：新游客对新站点（游客T002为站点S002反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result3 = processFeedback("T002", "S002");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + 自定义异常类\n * 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出此异常\n * 对应用例中的Errored用例\n */\npublic class InvalidFeedbackException extends Exception {\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message) {\n        super(message);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息和原因\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     * @param cause 异常原因\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message, Throwable cause) {\n        super(message, cause);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个标准的异常对象，包含数据验证失败的具体原因\n     * @param rating 评分值\n     * @param comment 评论内容\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(int rating, String comment) {\n        StringBuilder errorMsg = new StringBuilder("反馈数据无效或不充分: ");\n        \n        // 检查评分是否有效\n        if (rating < 1 || rating > 5) {\n            errorMsg.append(String.format("评分 \'%d\' 不在有效范围内 (1-5)。", rating));\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否有效\n        if (comment == null || comment.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            if (errorMsg.length() > 0) errorMsg.append(" ");\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容不能为空。");\n        }\n        \n        // 如果评分有效但评论长度不足，也给出提示\n        if (rating >= 1 && rating <= 5 && comment != null && !comment.trim().isEmpty() \n            && comment.trim().length() < 5) {\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容至少需要5个字符。");\n        }\n        \n        return new InvalidFeedbackException(errorMsg.toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个简化的异常对象\n     * @param reason 错误原因描述\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(String reason) {\n        return new InvalidFeedbackException("反馈数据无效: " + reason);\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. feedback.setFeedbackId(feedbackId);\n        \n        // 保存到反馈存储\n        feedbackStorage.put(feedbackId, feedback);\n        \n        // 更新游客的已访问站点列表\n        Tourist tourist = 实现InsertFeedback用例的业务逻辑，协调表单验证、数据存储和异常处理\n * 执行用例中的主要步骤：\n * 1. 激活反馈功能\n * 2. 验证游客是否已发布反馈\n * 3. 处理表单数据\n * 4. 验证数据有效性\n * 5. 保存反馈\n * 6. 处理各种退出条件\n */\npublic class FeedbackService {\n    private DataStorage dataStorage;\n    private FeedbackForm feedbackForm;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    public FeedbackService(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        this.dataStorage = dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 执行InsertFeedback用例的主要方法\n     * 入口条件：游客卡片在特定站点\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含成功/失败信息和反馈ID\n     * @throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException 当游客已为站点发布反馈时抛出\n     * @throws InvalidFeedbackException 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出\n     * @throws IllegalStateException 当出现未预期的状态错误时抛出\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult executeInsertFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) \n            throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException, InvalidFeedbackException, IllegalStateException {\n        \n        // 步骤1：激活反馈功能 - 记录日志\n        System.out.println("=== 激活反馈功能 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客ID: " + touristId + ", 站点ID: " + siteId);\n        \n        // 验证入口条件：检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("游客ID \'" + touristId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        if (!dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("站点ID \'" + siteId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤2：验证游客尚未为站点发布反馈\n        if (dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n            System.out.println("错误：游客已经为该站点发布过反馈。");\n            throw FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException.create(touristId, siteId);\n        }\n        \n        // 显示验证通过信息\n        System.out.println("验证通过：游客尚未为该站点发布反馈。");\n        \n        // 创建反馈表单，对应步骤2的显示表单部分\n        feedbackForm = new FeedbackForm(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接 - 处理连接中断的退出条件\n        if (!feedbackForm.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("错误：连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断。操作已取消。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            throw new IllegalStateException("服务器连接中断。无法继续操作。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤3：显示表单并收集输入，处理用户取消操作\n        System.out.println("\\n显示反馈表单...");\n        boolean formSubmitted = feedbackForm.showForm();\n        \n        // 处理用户取消操作（退出条件之一）\n        if (!formSubmitted) {\n            System.out.println("游客取消了反馈操作。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "操作被游客取消。");\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 步骤4：验证输入的数据\n            int rating = feedbackForm.getRating();\n            String comment = feedbackForm.getComment();\n            \n            // 创建临时反馈对象进行验证\n            Feedback tempFeedback = new Feedback("TEMP", touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n            \n            if (!tempFeedback.isValid()) {\n                System.out.println("错误：反馈数据无效或不充分。");\n                // 对应用例中的Errored用例\n                throw InvalidFeedbackException.create(rating, comment);\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤5：确认发布反馈\n            System.out.println("\\n正在确认发布反馈...");\n            \n            // 在真实系统中，这里可能会有额外的确认步骤\n            // 例如：发送确认邮件或显示确认对话框\n            \n            // 步骤6：记录反馈并将选定站点插入已访问站点列表\n            System.out.println("正在保存反馈...");\n            \n            // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n            String feedbackId = generateFeedbackId();\n            \n            // 创建最终的反馈对象\n            Feedback finalFeedback = feedbackForm.createFeedback(feedbackId);\n            \n            // 保存到数据存储\n            String savedFeedbackId = dataStorage.saveFeedback(finalFeedback);\n            \n            // 显示成功信息\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈保存成功 ===");\n            System.out.println("反馈ID: " + savedFeedbackId);\n            System.out.println("站点已添加到游客的已访问站点列表。");\n            System.out.println("游客已添加到站点的访问游客列表。");\n            \n            // 返回成功结果\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(true, savedFeedbackId, "反馈成功提交到站点。");\n            \n        } finally {\n            // 确保表单资源被关闭\n            if (feedbackForm != null) {\n                feedbackForm.close();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 处理InsertFeedback操作的便捷方法\n     * 这个方法包装了executeInsertFeedback方法，提供了更好的异常处理\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含处理结果和详细信息\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult processFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        try {\n            return executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {\n            System.out.println("数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (IllegalStateException e) {\n            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否可以为特定站点提供反馈\n     * 这个方法单独公开，以便在其他地方进行预检查\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果游客可以提供反馈返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean canTouristProvideFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        // 检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId) || !dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查游客是否已经为该站点提供过反馈\n        return !dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取数据存储实例\n     * @return 当前的数据存储实例\n     */\n    public DataStorage getDataStorage() {\n        return dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成唯一的反馈ID\n     * @return 唯一的反馈ID字符串\n     */\n    private String generateFeedbackId() {\n        // 使用UUID生成唯一ID，在实际应用中可以根据需要调整生成策略\n        return "FB_" + UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 8);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * InsertFeedbackResult类 - 内部结果类\n     * 用于封装InsertFeedback操作的结果\n     */\n    public static class InsertFeedbackResult {\n        private boolean success;\n        private String feedbackId;\n        private String message;\n        \n        /**\n         * 构造函数\n         * @param success 是否成功\n         * @param feedbackId 反馈ID（成功时）\n         * @param message 结果消息\n         */\n        public InsertFeedbackResult(boolean success, String feedbackId, String message) {\n            this.success = success;\n            this.feedbackId = feedbackId;\n            this.message = message;\n        }\n        \n        // Getter方法\n        \n        public boolean isSuccess() {\n            return success;\n        }\n        \n        public String getFeedbackId() {\n            return feedbackId;\n        }\n        \n        public String getMessage() {\n            return message;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return String.format("InsertFeedbackResult{success=%s, feedbackId=\'%s\', message=\'%s\'}", \n                               success, feedbackId, message);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 模拟测试方法：模拟反馈操作的不同场景\n     * 用于内部测试和演示\n     */\n    public void runTestScenarios() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 运行测试场景 ===");\n        \n        // 场景1：正常流程\n        System.out.println("\\n场景1：正常反馈流程");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result1 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result1.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景2：重复反馈（应该触发FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException）\n        System.out.println("\\n场景2：重复反馈（游客T001为站点S001再次反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result2 = processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result2.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景3：新游客对新站点\n        System.out.println("\\n场景3：新游客对新站点（游客T002为站点S002反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result3 = processFeedback("T002", "S002");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result3.getMessage());\n        \n        // 场景4：不存在的游客或站点\n        System.out.println("\\n场景4：不存在的游客（游客T999为站点S001反馈）");\n        InsertFeedbackResult result4 = processFeedback("T999", "S001");\n        System.out.println("结果: " + result4.getMessage());\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': import java.util.Scanner;

/**
 * InsertFeedbackApplication - 主应用程序类
 * 演示InsertFeedback用例的完整流程，包含main方法、用例演示和各种场景测试
 * 这个类是程序的入口点，协调所有组件来演示完整的用例流程
 */
public class InsertFeedbackApplication {
    
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("========================================");
        System.out.println("      InsertFeedback 应用程序启动       ");
        System.out.println("========================================");
        System.out.println("描述：为选定的站点插入反馈");
        System.out.println("参与者：游客");
        System.out.println("入口条件：游客卡片在特定站点\n");
        
        try {
            // 1. 初始化数据存储和服务
            DataStorage dataStorage = new DataStorage();
            FeedbackService feedbackService = new FeedbackService(dataStorage);
            
            // 2. 显示初始数据状态
            displayInitialData(dataStorage);
            
            // 3. 创建用户输入扫描器
            Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
            
            // 4. 主交互循环
            boolean exit = false;
            while (!exit) {
                displayMainMenu();
                
                String choice = scanner.nextLine().trim();
                
                switch (choice) {
                    case "1":
                        // 执行完整的反馈流程
                        executeFeedbackProcess(feedbackService, scanner);
                        break;
                        
                    case "2":
                        // 运行测试场景
                        feedbackService.runTestScenarios();
                        break;
                        
                    case "3":
                        // 显示当前数据状态
                        displayCurrentData(dataStorage);
                        break;
                        
                    case "4":
                        // 检查游客是否可以提供反馈
                        checkFeedbackEligibility(feedbackService, scanner);
                        break;
                        
                    case "5":
                        // 演示不同退出条件
                        demonstrateExitConditions(feedbackService, scanner);
                        break;
                        
                    case "6":
                        // 重置数据
                        dataStorage.clearAllStorage();
                        System.out.println("数据已重置为初始状态。");
                        displayCurrentData(dataStorage);
                        break;
                        
                    case "0":
                        exit = true;
                        System.out.println("感谢使用InsertFeedback应用程序！");
                        break;
                        
                    default:
                        System.out.println("无效的选择，请重新输入。");
                }
            }
            
            scanner.close();
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.err.println("应用程序发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 显示主菜单
     */
    private static void displayMainMenu() {
        System.out.println("\n=== 主菜单 ===");
        System.out.println("1. 执行反馈流程");
        System.out.println("2. 运行测试场景");
        System.out.println("3. 显示当前数据状态");
        System.out.println("4. 检查反馈资格");
        System.out.println("5. 演示退出条件");
        System.out.println("6. 重置数据");
        System.out.println("0. 退出程序");
        System.out.print("请选择操作: ");
    }
    
    /**
     * 显示初始数据状态
     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例
     */
    private static void displayInitialData(DataStorage dataStorage) {
        System.out.println("=== 初始数据状态 ===");
        System.out.println(dataStorage.getStorageStats());
        
        System.out.println("可用的游客:");
        for (Tourist tourist : dataStorage.getAllTourists()) {
            System.out.println("  " + tourist.getTouristId() + ": " + tourist.getName());
        }
        
        System.out.println("\n可用的站点:");
        for (Site site : dataStorage.getAllSites()) {
            System.out.println("  " + site.getSiteId() + ": " + site.getName() + 
                             " - " + site.getDescription());
        }
        System.out.println();
    }
    
    /**
     * 显示当前数据状态
     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例
     */
    private static void displayCurrentData(DataStorage dataStorage) {
        System.out.println("\n=== 当前数据状态 ===");
        System.out.println(dataStorage.getStorageStats());
        
        // 显示所有反馈
        System.out.println("所有反馈:");
        for (Feedback feedback : dataStorage.getAllFeedback()) {
            System.out.println("  " + feedback.getFeedbackId() + 
                             ": 游客 " + feedback.getTouristId() + 
                             " 给站点 " + feedback.getSiteId() + 
                             " 评分 " + feedback.getRating() + 
                             " 星，评论: " + feedback.getComment());
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 执行反馈流程（对应用例中的完整流程）
     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例
     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器
     */
    private static void executeFeedbackProcess(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {
        System.out.println("\n=== 执行反馈流程 ===");
        System.out.println("说明：此流程演示完整的InsertFeedback用例");
        
        // 获取游客和站点信息
        String touristId = getInput("请输入游客ID (例如: T001, T002): ", scanner);
        String siteId = getInput("请输入站点ID (例如: S001, S002): ", scanner);
        
        System.out.println("\n开始InsertFeedback用例流程...");
        
        try {
            // 对应于用例中的步骤1：激活反馈功能
            System.out.println("步骤1: 激活反馈功能...");
            
            // 执行反馈流程
            FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult result = 
                feedbackService.executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);
            
            // 显示结果
            System.out.println("\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");
            System.out.println("成功: " + result.isSuccess());
            System.out.println("消息: " + result.getMessage());
            
            if (result.isSuccess()) {
                System.out.println("反馈ID: " + result.getFeedbackId());
                System.out.println("退出条件: 系统已通知反馈成功提交到站点");
            }
            
        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {
            System.out.println("\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");
            System.out.println("退出条件: 激活FeedbackAlreadyReleased用例");
            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());
            
        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {
            System.out.println("\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");
            System.out.println("退出条件: 激活Errored用例");
            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.println("\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");
            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 检查游客是否可以提供反馈
     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例
     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器
     */
    private static void checkFeedbackEligibility(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {
        System.out.println("\n=== 检查反馈资格 ===");
        
        String touristId = getInput("请输入游客ID: ", scanner);
        String siteId = getInput("请输入站点ID: ", scanner);
        
        boolean canProvide = feedbackService.canTouristProvideFeedback(touristId, siteId);
        
        System.out.println("\n反馈资格检查结果:");
        System.out.println("游客: " + touristId);
        System.out.println("站点: " + siteId);
        System.out.println("可以提供反馈: " + (canProvide ? "是" : "否"));
        
        if (!canProvide) {
            System.out.println("可能的原因:");
            if (!feedbackService.getDataStorage().touristExists(touristId)) {
                System.out.println("  - 游客不存在");
            }
            if (!feedbackService.getDataStorage().siteExists(siteId)) {
                System.out.println("  - 站点不存在");
            }
            if (feedbackService.getDataStorage().hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {
                System.out.println("  - 游客已为该站点发布过反馈");
            }
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 演示不同退出条件
     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例
     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器
     */
    private static void demonstrateExitConditions(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {
        System.out.println("\n=== 演示退出条件 ===");
        System.out.println("1. 正常退出 - 成功提交反馈");
        System.out.println("2. 游客取消操作");
        System.out.println("3. 游客已发布反馈 (FeedbackAlreadyReleased)");
        System.out.println("4. 数据无效 (Errored)");
        System.out.println("5. 连接中断");
        System.out.print("请选择要演示的退出条件: ");
        
        String choice = scanner.nextLine().trim();
        
        switch (choice) {
            case "1":
                System.out.println("\n演示: 正常退出 - 成功提交反馈");
                // 使用新游客和新站点演示成功流程
                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult result = 
                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T003", "S003");
                System.out.println("结果: " + result.getMessage());
                System.out.println("退出条件: 系统通知反馈成功提交到站点");
                break;
                
            case "2":
                System.out.println("\n演示: 游客取消操作");
                System.out.println("说明: 在表单输入过程中，输入 'cancel' 可以取消操作");
                System.out.println("请输入 'cancel' 来测试取消操作:");
                
                // 创建一个新的游客和站点来演示取消
                System.out.println("开始反馈流程...");
                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult cancelResult = 
                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T003", "S001");
                System.out.println("结果: " + cancelResult.getMessage());
                System.out.println("退出条件: 游客取消操作");
                break;
                
            case "3":
                System.out.println("\n演示: 游客已发布反馈");
                System.out.println("说明: 首先创建一个反馈，然后尝试再次为相同站点创建反馈");
                
                // 先创建一个反馈
                feedbackService.processFeedback("T001", "S001");
                
                // 然后尝试再次创建反馈，会触发FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException
                System.out.println("\n尝试为相同站点再次创建反馈...");
                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult duplicateResult = 
                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T001", "S001");
                System.out.println("结果: " + duplicateResult.getMessage());
                System.out.println("退出条件: 激活FeedbackAlreadyReleased用例");
                break;
                
            case "4":
                System.out.println("\n演示: 数据无效");
                System.out.println("说明: 演示输入无效数据的情况");
                
                // 注意：这个方法需要修改FeedbackForm来模拟无效输入
                // 在实际演示中，用户可以手动输入无效数据进行测试
                System.out.println("请运行主菜单选项1，然后输入无效数据（如评分6或空评论）进行测试");
                System.out.println("退出条件: 激活Errored用例");
                break;
                
            case "5":
                System.out.println("\n演示: 连接中断");
                System.out.println("说明: 检查服务器连接");
                
                DataStorage dataStorage = feedbackService.getDataStorage();
                FeedbackForm form = new FeedbackForm("T001", "S001");
                
                if (form.checkServerConnection()) {
                    System.out.println("服务器连接正常");
                } else {
                    System.out.println("服务器连接中断");
                    System.out.println("退出条件: 连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断");
                }
                
                form.close();
                break;
                
            default:
                System.out.println("无效的选择");
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 获取用户输入
     * @param prompt 提示信息
     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器
     * @return 用户输入的字符串
     */
    private static String getInput(String prompt, Scanner scanner) {
        System.out.print(prompt);
        return scanner.nextLine().trim();
    }
    
    /**
     * 显示用例流程图，帮助理解整个用例的执行过程
     */
    private static void displayUseCaseFlow() {
        System.out.println("\n=== InsertFeedback 用例流程图 ===");
        System.out.println("入口条件: 游客卡片在特定站点");
        System.out.println("步骤1: 激活反馈功能");
        System.out.println("步骤2: 验证游客尚未发布反馈");
        System.out.println("       ├─ 如果已发布 → 激活FeedbackAlreadyReleased用例");
        System.out.println("       └─ 如果未发布 → 显示反馈表单");
        System.out.println("步骤3: 填写表单（评分 + 评论）");
        System.out.println("       ├─ 用户取消 → 操作取消");
        System.out.println("       └─ 用户提交 → 进入步骤4");
        System.out.println("步骤4: 验证输入数据");
        System.out.println("       ├─ 数据无效 → 激活Errored用例");
        System.out.println("       └─ 数据有效 → 进入步骤5");
        System.out.println("步骤5: 确认发布反馈");
        System.out.println("步骤6: 记录反馈并更新已访问站点列表");
        System.out.println("退出条件: 成功提交/用户取消/连接中断");
    }
}

/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertFeedback_1766845642/DataStorage.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.HashMap;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Map;\n\n/**\n * DataStorage类 - 数据存储类\n * 模拟数据库操作，包括反馈、站点和游客的存储和管理\n * 使用内存存储来模拟数据库，在实际应用中会被真正的数据库替换\n */\npublic class DataStorage {\n    // 使用Map来存储数据，键为ID，值为对象\n    private Map<String, Feedback> feedbackStorage;\n    private Map<String, Site> siteStorage;\n    private Map<String, Tourist> touristStorage;\n    \n    // 用于跟踪反馈ID的计数字\n    private int feedbackCounter;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化所有存储\n     */\n    public DataStorage() {\n        feedbackStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        siteStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        touristStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        feedbackCounter = 1; // 从1开始计数\n        \n        // 初始化一些示例数据\n        initializeSampleData();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 初始化示例数据，用于演示\n     */\n    private void initializeSampleData() {\n        // 创建示例站点\n        Site site1 = new Site("S001", "埃菲尔铁塔", "法国巴黎的著名地标");\n        Site site2 = new Site("S002", "大本钟", "英国伦敦的标志性建筑");\n        Site site3 = new Site("S003", "故宫", "中国北京的历史宫殿");\n        \n        siteStorage.put(site1.getSiteId(), site1);\n        siteStorage.put(site2.getSiteId(), site2);\n        siteStorage.put(site3.getSiteId(), site3);\n        \n        // 创建示例游客\n        Tourist tourist1 = new Tourist("T001", "张三");\n        Tourist tourist2 = new Tourist("T002", "李四");\n        Tourist tourist3 = new Tourist("T003", "王五");\n        \n        touristStorage.put(tourist1.getTouristId(), tourist1);\n        touristStorage.put(tourist2.getTouristId(), tourist2);\n        touristStorage.put(tourist3.getTouristId(), tourist3);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否已经为特定站点发布过反馈\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果已发布过反馈，返回true；否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean hasTouristGivenFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbackStorage.values()) {\n            if (feedback.getTouristId().equals(touristId) && \n                feedback.getSiteId().equals(siteId)) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 保存反馈到存储\n     * @param feedback 要保存的反馈对象\n     * @return 保存后的反馈ID\n     */\n    public String saveFeedback(Feedback feedback) {\n        // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n        String feedbackId = "F" + String.format("%03d", feedbackCounter++);\n        feedback.setFeedbackId(feedbackId);\n        \n        // 保存到反馈存储\n        feedbackStorage.put(feedbackId, feedback);\n        \n        // 更新游客的已访问站点列表\n        Tourist tourist = touristStorage.get(feedback.getTouristId());\n        if (tourist != null) {\n            tourist.addVisitedSite(feedback.getSiteId());\n        }\n        \n        // 更新站点的已访问游客列表\n        Site site = siteStorage.get(feedback.getSiteId());\n        if (site != null) {\n            site.addVisitedTourist(feedback.getTouristId());\n        }\n        \n        return feedbackId;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的站点\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 站点对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSite(String siteId) {\n        return siteStorage.get(siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的游客\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @return 游客对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Tourist getTourist(String touristId) {\n        return touristStorage.get(touristId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的反馈\n     * @param feedbackId 反馈ID\n     * @return 反馈对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Feedback getFeedback(String feedbackId) {\n        return feedbackStorage.get(feedbackId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取所有反馈\n     * @return 反馈列表\n     */\n    public List<Feedback> getAllFeedback() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(feedbackStorage.values());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定游客的所有反馈\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @return 该游客的反馈列表\n     */\n    public List<Feedback> getFeedbackByTourist(String touristId) {\n        List<Feedback> result = new ArrayList<>();\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbackStorage.values()) {\n            if (feedback.getTouristId().equals(touristId)) {\n 实现InsertFeedback用例的业务逻辑，协调表单验证、数据存储和异常处理\n * 执行用例中的主要步骤：\n * 1. 激活反馈功能\n * 2. 验证游客是否已发布反馈\n * 3. 处理表单数据\n * 4. 验证数据有效性\n * 5. 保存反馈\n * 6. 处理各种退出条件\n */\npublic class FeedbackService {\n    private DataStorage dataStorage;\n    private FeedbackForm feedbackForm;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    public FeedbackService(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        this.dataStorage = dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 执行InsertFeedback用例的主要方法\n     * 入口条件：游客卡片在特定站点\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含成功/失败信息和反馈ID\n     * @throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException 当游客已为站点发布反馈时抛出\n     * @throws InvalidFeedbackException 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出\n     * @throws IllegalStateException 当出现未预期的状态错误时抛出\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult executeInsertFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) \n            throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException, InvalidFeedbackException, IllegalStateException {\n        \n        // 步骤1：激活反馈功能 - 记录日志\n        System.out.println("=== 激活反馈功能 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客ID: " + touristId + ", 站点ID: " + siteId);\n        \n        // 验证入口条件：检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("游客ID \'" + touristId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        if (!dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("站点ID \'" + siteId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤2：验证游客尚未为站点发布反馈\n        if (dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n            System.out.println("错误：游客已经为该站点发布过反馈。");\n            throw FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException.create(touristId, siteId);\n        }\n        \n        // 显示验证通过信息\n        System.out.println("验证通过：游客尚未为该站点发布反馈。");\n        \n        // 创建反馈表单，对应步骤2的显示表单部分\n        feedbackForm = new FeedbackForm(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接 - 处理连接中断的退出条件\n        if (!feedbackForm.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("错误：连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断。操作已取消。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            throw new IllegalStateException("服务器连接中断。无法继续操作。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤3：显示表单并收集输入，处理用户取消操作\n        System.out.println("\\n显示反馈表单...");\n        boolean formSubmitted = feedbackForm.showForm();\n        \n        // 处理用户取消操作（退出条件之一）\n        if (!formSubmitted) {\n            System.out.println("游客取消了反馈操作。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "操作被游客取消。");\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 步骤4：验证输入的数据\n            int rating = feedbackForm.getRating();\n            String comment = feedbackForm.getComment();\n            \n            // 创建临时反馈对象进行验证\n            Feedback tempFeedback = new Feedback("TEMP", touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n            \n            if (!tempFeedback.isValid()) {\n                System.out.println("错误：反馈数据无效或不充分。");\n                // 对应用例中的Errored用例\n                throw InvalidFeedbackException.create(rating, comment);\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤5：确认发布反馈\n            System.out.println("\\n正在确认发布反馈...");\n            \n            // 在真实系统中，这里可能会有额外的确认步骤\n            // 例如：发送确认邮件或显示确认对话框\n            \n            // 步骤6：记录反馈并将选定站点插入已访问站点列表\n            System.out.println("正在保存反馈...");\n            \n            // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n            String feedbackId = generateFeedbackId();\n            \n            // 创建最终的反馈对象\n            Feedback finalFeedback = feedbackForm.createFeedback(feedbackId);\n            \n            // 保存到数据存储\n            String savedFeedbackId = dataStorage.saveFeedback(finalFeedback);\n            \n            // 显示成功信息\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈保存成功 ===");\n            System.out.println("反馈ID: " + savedFeedbackId);\n savedFeedbackId, "反馈成功提交到站点。");\n            \n        } finally {\n            // 确保表单资源被关闭\n            if (feedbackForm != null) {\n                feedbackForm.close();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 处理InsertFeedback操作的便捷方法\n     * 这个方法包装了executeInsertFeedback方法，提供了更好的异常处理\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含处理结果和详细信息\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult processFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        try {\n            return executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {\n            System.out.println("数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "数据验证失败: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (IllegalStateException e) {\n            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "未预期的错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否可以为特定站点提供反馈\n     * 这个方法单独公开，以便在其他地方进行预检查\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果游客可以提供反馈返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean canTouristProvideFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        // 检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId) || !dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查游客是否已经为该站点提供过反馈\n        return !dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取数据存储实例\n     * @return 当前的数据存储实例\n     */\n    public DataStorage getDataStorage() {\n        return dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成唯一的反馈ID\n     * @return 唯一的反馈ID字符串\n     */\n    private String generateFeedbackId() {\n        // 使用UUID生成唯一ID，在实际应用中可以根据需要调整生成策略\n        return "FB_" + UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 8);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * InsertFeedbackResult类 - 内部结果类\n     * 用于封装InsertFeedback操作的结果\n     */\n    public static class InsertFeedbackResult {\n        private boolean success;\n        private String feedbackId;\n        private String message;\n        \n        public boolean isSuccess() {\n            return success;\n        }\n        \n        public String getFeedbackId() {\n            return feedbackId;\n        }\n        \n        public String getMessage() {\n            return message;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return String.format("InsertFeedbackResult{success=%s, feedbackId=\'%s\', message=\'%s\'}", \n                               success, feedbackId, message);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 模拟测试方法：模拟反馈操作的不同场景\n     * 用于内部测试和演示\n     */\n    public InsertFeedback 应用程序启动       ");\n        System.out.println("========================================");\n        System.out.println("描述：为选定的站点插入反馈");\n        System.out.println("参与者：游客");\n }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示初始数据状态\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    private static void displayInitialData(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        System.out.println("=== 初始数据状态 ===");\n  " + tourist.getTouristId() + ": " + tourist.getName());\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n可用的站点:");\n        for (Site site : dataStorage.getAllSites()) {\n  * 显示当前数据状态\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    private static void displayCurrentData(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 当前数据状态 ===");\n               " 评分 " + feedback.getRating() + \n                             " 星，评论: " + feedback.getComment());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 执行反馈流程（对应用例中的完整流程）\n     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例\n     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器\n     */\n    private static void executeFeedbackProcess(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 执行反馈流程 ===");\n        System.out.println("说明：此流程演示完整的InsertFeedback用例");\n        \n        // 获取游客和站点信息\n        String touristId = getInput("请输入游客ID (例如: T001, T002): ", scanner);\n        String siteId = getInput("请输入站点ID (例如: S001, S002): ", scanner);\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n开始InsertFeedback用例流程...");\n        \n        try {\n            // 对应于用例中的步骤1：激活反馈功能\n            System.out.println("步骤1: 激活反馈功能...");\n            \n            // 执行反馈流程\n            FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult result = \n                feedbackService.executeInsertFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n            \n            // 显示结果\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");\n            System.out.println("成功: " + result.isSuccess());\n            System.out.println("消息: " + result.getMessage());\n            \n            if (result.isSuccess()) {\n                System.out.println("反馈ID: " + result.getFeedbackId());\n                System.out.println("退出条件: 系统已通知反馈成功提交到站点");\n            }\n            \n        } catch (FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException e) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");\n            System.out.println("退出条件: 激活FeedbackAlreadyReleased用例");\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            \n        } catch (InvalidFeedbackException e) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");\n            System.out.println("退出条件: 激活Errored用例");\n            System.out.println("错误: " + e.getMessage());\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈流程结果 ===");\n            System.out.println("系统错误: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否可以提供反馈\n     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例\n     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器\n     */\n    private static void checkFeedbackEligibility(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 检查反馈资格 ===");\n        \n        String touristId = getInput("请输入游客ID: ", scanner);\n        String siteId = getInput("请输入站点ID: ", scanner);\n        \n        boolean canProvide = feedbackService.canTouristProvideFeedback(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n反馈资格检查结果:");\n        System.out.println("游客: " + touristId);\n        System.out.println("站点: " + siteId);\n        System.out.println("可以提供反馈: " + (canProvide ? "是" : "否"));\n        \n        if (!canProvide) {\n            System.out.println("可能的原因:");\n            if (!feedbackService.getDataStorage().touristExists(touristId)) {\n                System.out.println("  - 游客不存在");\n            }\n            if (!feedbackService.getDataStorage().siteExists(siteId)) {\n                System.out.println("  - 站点不存在");\n            }\n            if (feedbackService.getDataStorage().hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n                System.out.println("  - 游客已为该站点发布过反馈");\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 演示不同退出条件\n     * @param feedbackService 反馈服务实例\n     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器\n     */\n    private static void demonstrateExitConditions(FeedbackService feedbackService, Scanner scanner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== 演示退出条件 ===");\n        System.out.println("1. 正常退出 - 成功提交反馈");\n        System.out.println("2. 游客取消操作");\n        System.out.println("3. 游客已发布反馈 (FeedbackAlreadyReleased)");\n        System.out.println("4. 数据无效 (Errored)");\n        System.out.println("5. 连接中断");\n        System.out.print("请选择要演示的退出条件: ");\n        \n        String choice = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        switch (choice) {\n            case "1":\n                System.out.println("\\n演示: 正常退出 - 成功提交反馈");\n                // 使用新游客和新站点演示成功流程\n                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult result = \n                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T003", "S003");\n                System.out.println("结果: " + result.getMessage());\n                System.out.println("退出条件: 系统通知反馈成功提交到站点");\n                break;\n                \n            case "2":\n                System.out.println("\\n演示: 游客取消操作");\n                System.out.println("说明: 在表单输入过程中，输入 \'cancel\' 可以取消操作");\n                System.out.println("请输入 \'cancel\' 来测试取消操作:");\n                \n                // 创建一个新的游客和站点来演示取消\n                System.out.println("开始反馈流程...");\n                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult cancelResult = \n                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T003", "S001");\n                System.out.println("结果: " + cancelResult.getMessage());\n                System.out.println("退出条件: 游客取消操作");\n                break;\n                \n            case "3":\n                System.out.println("\\n演示: 游客已发布反馈");\n                System.out.println("说明: 首先创建一个反馈，然后尝试再次为相同站点创建反馈");\n                \n                // 先创建一个反馈\n                feedbackService.processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n                \n                // 然后尝试再次创建反馈，会触发FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException\n                System.out.println("\\n尝试为相同站点再次创建反馈...");\n                FeedbackService.InsertFeedbackResult duplicateResult = \n                    feedbackService.processFeedback("T001", "S001");\n                System.out.println("结果: " + duplicateResult.getMessage());\n                System.out.println("退出条件: 激活FeedbackAlreadyReleased用例");\n                break;\n                \n            case "4":\n                System.out.println("\\n演示: 数据无效");\n                System.out.println("说明: 演示输入无效数据的情况");\n                \n                // 注意：这个方法需要修改FeedbackForm来模拟无效输入\n                // 在实际演示中，用户可以手动输入无效数据进行测试\n                System.out.println("请运行主菜单选项1，然后输入无效数据（如评分6或空评论）进行测试");\n                System.out.println("退出条件: 激活Errored用例");\n                break;\n                \n            case "5":\n                System.out.println("\\n演示: 连接中断");\n                System.out.println("说明: 检查服务器连接");\n                \n                DataStorage dataStorage = feedbackService.getDataStorage();\n                FeedbackForm form = new FeedbackForm("T001", "S001");\n                \n                if (form.checkServerConnection()) {\n                    System.out.println("服务器连接正常");\n                } else {\n                    System.out.println("服务器连接中断");\n                    System.out.println("退出条件: 连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断");\n                }\n                \n                form.close();\n                break;\n                \n            default:\n                System.out.println("无效的选择");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用户输入\n     * @param prompt 提示信息\n     * @param scanner 用户输入扫描器\n     * @return 用户输入的字符串\n     */\n    private static String getInput(String prompt, Scanner scanner) {\n        System.out.print(prompt);\n        return scanner.nextLine().trim();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示用例流程图，帮助理解整个用例的执行过程\n     */\n    private static void displayUseCaseFlow() {\n System.out.println("       ├─ 用户取消 → 操作取消");\n        System.out.println("       └─ 用户提交 → 进入步骤4");\n        System.out.println("步骤4: 验证输入数据");\n        System.out.println("       ├─ 数据无效 → 激活Errored用例");\n        System.out.println("       └─ 数据有效 → 进入步骤5");\n        System.out.println("步骤5: 确认发布反馈");\n        System.out.println("步骤6: 记录反馈并更新已访问站点列表");\n        System.out.println("退出条件: 自定义异常类\n * 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出此异常\n * 对应用例中的Errored用例\n */\npublic class InvalidFeedbackException extends Exception {\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message) {\n        super(message);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，包含错误信息和原因\n     * @param message 错误信息\n     * @param cause 异常原因\n     */\n    public InvalidFeedbackException(String message, Throwable cause) {\n        super(message, cause);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个标准的异常对象，包含数据验证失败的具体原因\n     * @param rating 评分值\n     * @param comment 评论内容\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(int rating, String comment) {\n        StringBuilder errorMsg = new StringBuilder("反馈数据无效或不充分: ");\n        \n        // 检查评分是否有效\n        if (rating < 1 || rating > 5) {\n            errorMsg.append(String.format("评分 \'%d\' 不在有效范围内 (1-5)。", rating));\n        }\n        \n        // 检查评论是否有效\n        if (comment == null || comment.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            if (errorMsg.length() > 0) errorMsg.append(" ");\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容不能为空。");\n        }\n        \n        // 如果评分有效但评论长度不足，也给出提示\n        if (rating >= 1 && rating <= 5 && comment != null && !comment.trim().isEmpty() \n            && comment.trim().length() < 5) {\n            errorMsg.append("评论内容至少需要5个字符。");\n        }\n        \n        return new InvalidFeedbackException(errorMsg.toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 创建一个简化的异常对象\n     * @param reason 错误原因描述\n     * @return 包含特定错误信息的InvalidFeedbackException对象\n     */\n    public static InvalidFeedbackException create(String reason) {\n        return new InvalidFeedbackException("反馈数据无效: " + reason);\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertFeedback_1766845642/DataStorage.java has been successfully created, with content:\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.HashMap;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Map;\n\n/**\n * DataStorage类 - 数据存储类\n * 模拟数据库操作，包括反馈、站点和游客的存储和管理\n * 使用内存存储来模拟数据库，在实际应用中会被真正的数据库替换\n */\npublic class DataStorage {\n    // 使用Map来存储数据，键为ID，值为对象\n    private Map<String, Feedback> feedbackStorage;\n    private Map<String, Site> siteStorage;\n    private Map<String, Tourist> touristStorage;\n    \n    // 用于跟踪反馈ID的计数字\n    private int feedbackCounter;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数，初始化所有存储\n     */\n    public DataStorage() {\n        feedbackStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        siteStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        touristStorage = new HashMap<>();\n        feedbackCounter = 1; // 从1开始计数\n        \n        // 初始化一些示例数据\n        initializeSampleData();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 初始化示例数据，用于演示\n     */\n    private void initializeSampleData() {\n        // 创建示例站点\n        Site site1 = new Site("S001", "埃菲尔铁塔", "法国巴黎的著名地标");\n        Site site2 = new Site("S002", "大本钟", "英国伦敦的标志性建筑");\n        Site site3 = new Site("S003", "故宫", "中国北京的历史宫殿");\n        \n        siteStorage.put(site1.getSiteId(), site1);\n        siteStorage.put(site2.getSiteId(), site2);\n        siteStorage.put(site3.getSiteId(), site3);\n        \n        // 创建示例游客\n        Tourist tourist1 = new Tourist("T001", "张三");\n        Tourist tourist2 = new Tourist("T002", "李四");\n        Tourist tourist3 = new Tourist("T003", "王五");\n        \n        touristStorage.put(tourist1.getTouristId(), tourist1);\n        touristStorage.put(tourist2.getTouristId(), tourist2);\n        touristStorage.put(tourist3.getTouristId(), tourist3);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查游客是否已经为特定站点发布过反馈\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 如果已发布过反馈，返回true；否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean hasTouristGivenFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) {\n        for (Feedback feedback : feedbackStorage.values()) {\n            if (feedback.getTouristId().equals(touristId) && \n                feedback.getSiteId().equals(siteId)) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 保存反馈到存储\n     * @param feedback 要保存的反馈对象\n     * @return 保存后的反馈ID\n     */\n    public String saveFeedback(Feedback feedback) {\n        // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n        String feedbackId = "F" + String.format("%03d", feedbackCounter++);\n        feedback.setFeedbackId(feedbackId);\n        \n        // 保存到反馈存储\n        feedbackStorage.put(feedbackId, feedback);\n        \n        // 更新游客的已访问站点列表\n        Tourist tourist = touristStorage.get(feedback.getTouristId());\n        if (tourist != null) {\n            tourist.addVisitedSite(feedback.getSiteId());\n        }\n        \n        // 更新站点的已访问游客列表\n        Site site = siteStorage.get(feedback.getSiteId());\n        if (site != null) {\n            site.addVisitedTourist(feedback.getTouristId());\n        }\n        \n        return feedbackId;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的站点\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 站点对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Site getSite(String siteId) {\n        return siteStorage.get(siteId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的游客\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @return 游客对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Tourist getTourist(String touristId) {\n        return touristStorage.get(touristId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定ID的反馈\n     * @param feedbackId 反馈ID\n     * @return 反馈对象，如果不存在则返回null\n     */\n    public Feedback getFeedback(String feedbackId) {\n        return feedbackStorage.get(feedbackId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取所有反馈\n     * @return 反馈列表\n     */\n    public List<Feedback> getAllFeedback() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(feedbackStorage.values());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取指定游客的所有反馈\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @return 该游客的反馈列表\n     */\n    public List<Feedback> getFeedbackByTourist(String 实现InsertFeedback用例的业务逻辑，协调表单验证、数据存储和异常处理\n * 执行用例中的主要步骤：\n * 1. 激活反馈功能\n * 2. 验证游客是否已发布反馈\n * 3. 处理表单数据\n * 4. 验证数据有效性\n * 5. 保存反馈\n * 6. 处理各种退出条件\n */\npublic class FeedbackService {\n    private DataStorage dataStorage;\n    private FeedbackForm feedbackForm;\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * @param dataStorage 数据存储实例\n     */\n    public FeedbackService(DataStorage dataStorage) {\n        this.dataStorage = dataStorage;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 执行InsertFeedback用例的主要方法\n     * 入口条件：游客卡片在特定站点\n     * @param touristId 游客ID\n     * @param siteId 站点ID\n     * @return 执行结果，包含成功/失败信息和反馈ID\n     * @throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException 当游客已为站点发布反馈时抛出\n     * @throws InvalidFeedbackException 当反馈数据无效或不充分时抛出\n     * @throws IllegalStateException 当出现未预期的状态错误时抛出\n     */\n    public InsertFeedbackResult executeInsertFeedback(String touristId, String siteId) \n            throws FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException, InvalidFeedbackException, IllegalStateException {\n        \n        // 步骤1：激活反馈功能 - 记录日志\n        System.out.println("=== 激活反馈功能 ===");\n        System.out.println("游客ID: " + touristId + ", 站点ID: " + siteId);\n        \n        // 验证入口条件：检查游客和站点是否存在\n        if (!dataStorage.touristExists(touristId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("游客ID \'" + touristId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        if (!dataStorage.siteExists(siteId)) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("站点ID \'" + siteId + "\' 不存在。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤2：验证游客尚未为站点发布反馈\n        if (dataStorage.hasTouristGivenFeedback(touristId, siteId)) {\n            System.out.println("错误：游客已经为该站点发布过反馈。");\n            throw FeedbackAlreadyReleasedException.create(touristId, siteId);\n        }\n        \n        // 显示验证通过信息\n        System.out.println("验证通过：游客尚未为该站点发布反馈。");\n        \n        // 创建反馈表单，对应步骤2的显示表单部分\n        feedbackForm = new FeedbackForm(touristId, siteId);\n        \n        // 检查服务器连接 - 处理连接中断的退出条件\n        if (!feedbackForm.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("错误：连接到ETOUR服务器的连接中断。操作已取消。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            throw new IllegalStateException("服务器连接中断。无法继续操作。");\n        }\n        \n        // 步骤3：显示表单并收集输入，处理用户取消操作\n        System.out.println("\\n显示反馈表单...");\n        boolean formSubmitted = feedbackForm.showForm();\n        \n        // 处理用户取消操作（退出条件之一）\n        if (!formSubmitted) {\n            System.out.println("游客取消了反馈操作。");\n            feedbackForm.close();\n            return new InsertFeedbackResult(false, null, "操作被游客取消。");\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            // 步骤4：验证输入的数据\n            int rating = feedbackForm.getRating();\n            String comment = feedbackForm.getComment();\n            \n            // 创建临时反馈对象进行验证\n            Feedback tempFeedback = new Feedback("TEMP", touristId, siteId, rating, comment);\n            \n            if (!tempFeedback.isValid()) {\n                System.out.println("错误：反馈数据无效或不充分。");\n                // 对应用例中的Errored用例\n                throw InvalidFeedbackException.create(rating, comment);\n            }\n            \n            // 步骤5：确认发布反馈\n            System.out.println("\\n正在确认发布反馈...");\n            \n            // 在真实系统中，这里可能会有额外的确认步骤\n            // 例如：发送确认邮件或显示确认对话框\n            \n            // 步骤6：记录反馈并将选定站点插入已访问站点列表\n            System.out.println("正在保存反馈...");\n            \n            // 生成唯一的反馈ID\n            String feedbackId = generateFeedbackId();\n            \n            // 创建最终的反馈对象\n            Feedback finalFeedback = feedbackForm.createFeedback(feedbackId);\n            \n            // 保存到数据存储\n            String savedFeedbackId = dataStorage.saveFeedback(finalFeedback);\n            \n            // 显示成功信息\n            System.out.println("\\n=== 反馈保存成功 ===");\n            System.out.println("反馈ID: " + savedFeedbackId);\n
